level.heading: Transfer of licensed establishment to new location.
level.text: The Board shall consider an application to transfer a license to a new location according to the same standards and procedures as an application for an initial license and shall not presume appropriateness if a protest to the application is filed as set forth in Chapter 6.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 13-298
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-298, see notes following ยง 25-101.
